lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Good morning. Do you run this establishment?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I don’t see other people around here, there’s just you. So you must be running this place on your own.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: That is actually kind of impressive. My name’s Paisley, by the way.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Anyway, about my order… I want something mild and slightly herbaceous.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I need my focus to be on point. I’m preparing for my exams that come two months from now, and I want to be ready.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Make me something like that.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: No, that’s not what I asked.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: You need to focus, chief. Focus!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I asked for something mild and just a little herbaceous. And also, once you’re done serving me, you can also make one just like that for yourself as well.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Huh. That’s actually pretty good. Better than I expected. You keep surprising me, chief.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Okay, now that is more like it. Much appreciated.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: That one takes me back to high school. Back at my parent’s house, I used to drink tea just like that when I was pulling my all-nighters.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: It helps me take my mind off of things, and to concentrate my attention on the things that really need it.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I’m sorry if I acted a little bit stiff. There’s this one thing that’s on my mind and it keeps bothering me.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I have to ask you. What do you think 'being supportive' means?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Sorry if that’s out of the left field. I just want to know what you think about it.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Thanks for your input.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Maybe I did understand it the wrong way…

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Oh, right. I asked you because recently I screwed up big time.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: At least, I think I did. But I don’t know what I was supposed to do back then.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I just don’t understand…

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: But I won’t get anywhere by wallowing in misery. I’m going to think about it some more. Goodbye for now!
